ThingDef.label: wound infection bacteria sample
ThingDef.description: A sample of wound infection bacteria. When placed in a bacteria incubator, it will grow into multiple wound infection pathogen colonies that can later be harvested and used in the production of vaccines and antiserums. No weapons can be crafted from wound infection pathogens.\n\nCan be obtained by using disease sampler on a living creature with wound infection or crafted from wound infection pathogens.

ThingDef.label: wound infection bacteria pathogen
ThingDef.description: A wound infection bacteria pathogen that's a crucial ingredient in producing vaccines and antiserums. No weapons can be crafted from this pathogen. It must be kept indoors at freezing temperatures to stay fresh and usable.

ThingDef.label: wound infection vaccine
ThingDef.description: A syringe containing a carefully prepared mixture of antigens. It prevents getting sick from wound infection for 8 days.\n\nNote that it does not cure existing infections.

HediffDef.label: wound infection immunity
HediffDef.description: wound infection antigens in the bloodstream. Comes from wound infection vaccine.

ThingDef.label: wound infection antiserum
ThingDef.description: A highly concentrated mixture of antibodies enhanced with spacer technology that rapidly spreads through the user's bloodstream. It can be ingested, granting instant immunity to wound infection. Powerful glitterworld medicine makes it highly effective and capable of killing even parasites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wound infection antibodies
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft wound infection vaccines and antiserums that can heal and protect from getting infected. This research project must be studied using vaccine reseach station with an inserted wound infection bacteria sample.\n\nThis project in always locked in research tab.
